title: Extended Timeline EU4 mod version 0.9.2 (3rd times the charm?)
description:
APOLOGIES FOR THE PREVIOUS FAILED ATTEMPTS SOME KIND OF 7ZIP ERROR WENT TO RAR


Extended Timelines EU4 mod version 0.9.2

Extract rar file to your 'C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod' folder

DESCRIPTION
Up to date for EUIV version 1.7 and all DLC.

The Extended Timeline starts in the year 51 and continues all the way to the present day. You can play with the ancient Roman Empire, any modern world nation or anything in between.

Main features:
- Playable timeline extended to 51-9999.
- Over 500 countries, each with historical territories and rulers at any given date.
- Added over 100 new provinces removing all wastelands.
- 21 new religions.
- New cultures, technologies and units.
- Bunch of new events and decisions.
